channel.title: Help with shops
channel.description: im making a new minigame, where you kill npcs for points, and im trying to make the shop for it. can someone help me? how do i make a shop use differrent currency (lets say tokkul) i saw a tutorial on this once, but becase im using project-czar source, i got 100 errors (i could'nt find the packets)
